taxon_identification.name_authority_date: Zizania aquatica L. var. brevis Fassett

bio:treatment.description: Plants 0.2-1 m. Blades 3-12(20) mm wide. Pistillate spikelets 5-11 mm; awns 1-8 mm.
bio:treatment.discussion: Zizania aquatica var. brevis is known from tidal mud flats along the St. Lawrence River, about 80 km up- and downstream from Quebec City, and from a small delta along the northern shore of the northwest Miramichi River estuary in New Brunswick.
